tool_description: The NSFW classifier is capable of accurately detecting inappropriate content, even in generative AI images and avatars.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-image-detector-or-classifier.p.rapidapi.com/api-v1.0/SafeUnsafeImageWithTags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-image-detector-or-classifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-image-detector-or-classifier.p.rapidapi.com/api-v1.0/SafeUnsafeImageWithTags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-image-detector-or-classifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
